products.name: Jali Jewellery
products.description: Exquisite hand-carved elephant sculpture featuring intricate Ambabari design, crafted by master artisans of Jaipur.
products.longDescription:
This magnificent Royal Ambabari Elephant represents the pinnacle of Rajasthani wooden craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously hand-carved by our master artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations. The Ambabari style, originating from the royal courts of Jaipur, features elaborate howdah (seat) designs and ornate decorations that once adorned the elephants of Maharajas.

The sculpture captures the majestic grace of the Indian elephant, adorned with intricate patterns, bells, and royal regalia. The natural grain of premium teak wood adds warmth and character to each unique piece, ensuring no two elephants are exactly alike.

Perfect as a statement piece for your living room, office, or as a treasured gift that carries the spirit of India's rich cultural heritage.
features: Unique piece - no two are identical

reviews.author: Priya Sharma
reviews.title: Absolutely stunning piece!
reviews.content: I've been collecting wooden handicrafts for years, and this elephant is one of the finest pieces I own. The attention to detail is remarkable - you can see the care that went into every carving. The photos don't do it justice!

reviews.author: Michael Johnson
reviews.title: Perfect gift for my parents
reviews.content: Bought this as an anniversary gift for my parents who love Indian art. They were absolutely thrilled! The packaging was excellent and it arrived in perfect condition despite international shipping.

reviews.author: Anita Patel
reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship
reviews.content: Very happy with my purchase. The elephant is beautifully carved and the wood quality is excellent. Only giving 4 stars because delivery took a bit longer than expected, but the product itself is perfect.

products.name: Majestic Peacock Panel
products.description: Stunning hand-carved peacock panel in premium rosewood, featuring the national bird of India in full glory.
products.longDescription:
This exquisite Majestic Peacock Panel celebrates India's national bird in all its splendor. Carved from select rosewood, known for its rich, dark hues and fine grain, this wall art piece brings the beauty of nature into your home.

The peacock, a symbol of grace, beauty, and pride in Indian culture, is depicted with its magnificent tail feathers fully spread. Each feather is individually carved with intricate eye patterns, showcasing the remarkable skill of our artisans.

This piece makes a stunning focal point for any room and serves as a conversation starter, reflecting the rich artistic heritage of Indian craftsmanship.
features: Ready to hang with included hardware
Perfect for living rooms and offices

reviews.author: Rajesh Kumar
reviews.title: Masterpiece for my living room
reviews.content: This peacock panel has become the centerpiece of my living room. Everyone who visits comments on its beauty. The rosewood color is rich and warm, and the carving detail is exceptional.

products.name: Vintage Carved Mirror
products.description: Elegant vintage-style mirror with hand-carved sheesham wood frame featuring traditional floral motifs.
products.longDescription:
Add timeless elegance to your space with this Vintage Carved Mirror. The frame is crafted from premium sheesham wood, prized for its strength and beautiful grain patterns. Traditional floral and vine motifs are intricately carved around the frame, creating a stunning border that transforms a functional mirror into a work of art.

The vintage design draws inspiration from the ornate mirrors once found in royal palaces of Rajasthan, bringing a touch of regal sophistication to your home. Perfect for entryways, bedrooms, or living spaces where you want to create a focal point.
features: Can be hung vertically or horizontally

products.name: Hand-Carved Radha Krishna
products.description: Divine Radha Krishna sculpture carved in rare white kadam wood, depicting the eternal love of the divine couple.
products.longDescription:
This sacred Radha Krishna sculpture captures the divine love between Lord Krishna and Radha, a theme central to Hindu devotion and art. Carved from rare white kadam wood, known for its smooth texture and ability to hold fine details, this piece is both a spiritual object and an artistic masterpiece.

The sculpture depicts Radha and Krishna in a loving pose, surrounded by intricate floral motifs and the suggestion of Vrindavan's sacred groves. The white kadam wood gives the piece a serene, almost ethereal quality that enhances its spiritual significance.

Ideal for home temples, meditation spaces, or as a meaningful gift for those who appreciate devotional art.
features: Exceptional detail in faces and ornaments

reviews.author: Meera Desai
reviews.title: Divine presence in my home
reviews.content: This sculpture has brought such positive energy to my prayer room. The craftsmanship is beyond words - the expressions on Radha and Krishna's faces are so peaceful and loving. Worth every rupee.

products.name: Dashavatara Wall Frieze
products.description: Magnificent wall frieze depicting the ten avatars of Lord Vishnu, hand-carved in antique teak with museum-quality finish.
products.longDescription:
This extraordinary Dashavatara Wall Frieze is a masterpiece that tells the story of Lord Vishnu's ten divine incarnations. Carved from carefully sourced antique teak wood, this piece represents the highest level of traditional Indian craftsmanship.

Each of the ten avatars - Matsya, Kurma, Varaha, Narasimha, Vamana, Parashurama, Rama, Krishna, Buddha, and Kalki - is depicted with distinctive iconography and attributes, creating a visual narrative of Hindu cosmology. The continuous frieze format was traditionally used in temple architecture, and this piece brings that sacred aesthetic into your home.

The antique teak gives the frieze a warm, aged appearance that suggests centuries of heritage, while the premium finish ensures it will remain beautiful for generations to come.
features: All ten avatars depicted with accuracy
Certificate of authenticity and story card

reviews.author: Dr. Vijay Malhotra
reviews.title: Museum-quality piece
reviews.content: As someone who has visited many museums and galleries, I can say this frieze would not be out of place in any of them. The craftsmanship is extraordinary, and the attention to iconographic detail is impressive. A true collector's piece.
